name: Dungeon of Humans
description:
Dungeon of Humans is a heartwarming story of a young skeleton, named Skelliboi, and his beloved friend, Tim. Tim and Skelliboi were practicing their trombone skills when suddenly King Ken The Handsome's minions attacked and struck down Tim. Skelliboi's quest is to gather his friend back together by wondering through the dungeon to slay the evil king in their quest for vengeance.

In-game by pressing H you get help screen showing you game controls

Dungeon of Humans is currently merely a demo, but the full game will be available as soon as finished.

We have couple of layering issues, but nothing major, we hope you enjoy!

Developers: 

Team lead: Theo Sihvo

Lead Artist: Firri April

Artists: Petri Uusitalo, Jenna Virtala

Programmers: Riikka Paksuniemi,  Teemu Palonen

Music Designer: Jani "Järppä" Järvinen
